/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling city street bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day. The sun, high in the clear blue sky, casts a bright light that illuminates the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars of different makes and models are parked neatly on the side of the road, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sunlight. The perspective of the image is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, giving a sense of being part of the city's daily hustle and bustle. The image is a beautiful blend of urban life and nature, captured in one frame.
